name: Museum Of The Old Normal
description:
Explore a curated selection of objects that fell out of use or belonged to extremely risky scenarios no longer possible in the current times.

Note: Maximum capacity of one consecutive visitor, abiding to all the health safety laws in place. 


Credits:
Gustavo Silva - Art
João Antunes - Programming

Originally made for Global Game Jam 2021 under the theme "Lost and Found".
